Name: Arcane Torrent
Story Background: In a time of great turmoil, an ancient wizard unleashed a powerful spell, causing a torrent of magical energy to surge across the land, reshaping the very fabric of reality.
Ability: Arcane Torrent allows you to search your library for a sorcery card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a swirling vortex of mystical blue energy, crackling with arcs of lightning and surrounded by flickering runes. The background shows a land being reshaped by the sheer force of magical power.
